com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class CapJsonBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapJsonBuilder

  • public class CapJsonBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes an Alert to a JSON object. Supports CAP 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2.
